question:
Which of the following organizations were founded by Balgangadhar Tilak:
1. All India Home Rule League
2. Deccan Education Society
3. Arya Bandhav Samaj
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Kindly note that Arya Bandhav Samaj was a secret revolutionary association <u>with which Tilak had close links.</u> It was established by P.S. Kankhoje. This organization is known to have made attempts at sowing disaffection in the army and the tribal population of the Central Provinces.
